SELECT /* selectNextContentsId */ online_subject_schedule.online_subject_schedule_id FROM online_subject_schedule INNER JOIN ( SELECT online_subject_id AS current_online_subject_id , `month` AS current_month , `position` AS current_position FROM online_subject_schedule WHERE online_subject_schedule_id = #{onlineSubjectScheduleId} ) current_data ON current_online_subject_id = online_subject_schedule.online_subject_id AND ( (current_month = online_subject_schedule.`month` AND online_subject_schedule.`position` > current_position) OR (online_subject_schedule.`month` > current_month) ) AND online_subject_schedule.active_ornot = 'Y' AND online_subject_schedule.delete_ornot = 'N' ORDER BY online_subject_schedule.`month` ASC, online_subject_schedule.position ASC, online_subject_schedule.seq ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* selectClassManage */ IFNULL(svc_mh_edu_cntr_cp.LEGACY_TCHER_ID, user_subject.LEGACY_TCHER_ID) AS LEGACY_TCHER_ID , online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_SCHEDULE_ID , class_manage.class_manage_id , class_attend_history.class_attend_history_id FROM online_subject_schedule INNER JOIN online_subject_sap_mapping ON online_subject_sap_mapping.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID = online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID AND online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_SCHEDULE_ID = #{onlineSubjectScheduleId} INNER JOIN user_subject ON user_subject.SAP_SUBJ_ID = online_subject_sap_mapping.SAP_SUBJECT_ID AND user_subject.USER_MANAGE_ID = #{userManageId} AND user_subject.DELETE_ORNOT = 'N' LEFT JOIN svc_mh_edu_cntr_cp ON svc_mh_edu_cntr_cp.EDU_CNTR_OID = user_subject.EDU_CNTR_OID AND svc_mh_edu_cntr_cp.EDU_STAT_CD = 'DA21010' LEFT JOIN class_manage ON class_manage.legacy_tcher_id = IFNULL(svc_mh_edu_cntr_cp.LEGACY_TCHER_ID, user_subject.LEGACY_TCHER_ID) AND class_manage.online_subject_schedule_id = online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_SCHEDULE_ID AND class_manage.delete_ornot = 'N' AND NOW() > class_manage.class_start_date AND ( class_manage.class_end_date > NOW() OR class_manage.class_end_date is null ) LEFT JOIN class_attend_history ON class_attend_history.class_manage_id = class_manage.class_manage_id AND class_attend_history.user_manage_id = user_subject.USER_MANAGE_ID AND class_attend_history.delete_ornot = 'N' ORDER BY class_manage.class_start_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* selectClassManageForcePassInfoCount */ COUNT(*) FROM online_subject_schedule INNER JOIN online_subject_sap_mapping ON online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID = online_subject_sap_mapping.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID AND online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_SCHEDULE_ID = #{onlineSubjectScheduleId} INNER JOIN user_subject ON user_subject.SAP_SUBJ_ID = online_subject_sap_mapping.SAP_SUBJECT_ID AND user_subject.DELETE_ORNOT = 'N' AND user_subject.USER_MANAGE_ID = #{userManageId} INNER JOIN online_subject ON online_subject.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID = online_subject_schedule.ONLINE_SUBJECT_ID INNER JOIN user_auth ON user_auth.USER_MANAGE_ID = user_subject.USER_MANAGE_ID AND user_auth.DELETE_ORNOT = 'N' AND user_auth.USER_STATUS_CODE = '01' INNER JOIN auth ON auth.AUTH_ID = user_auth.AUTH_ID AND auth.PRODUCT_ID = online_subject.PRODUCT_ID
